price: እነዚያ ክህደትን በእምነት የገዙ (የለወጡ) አላህን በምንም ነገር ፈጽሞ አይጎዱትም፡፡ ለእነሱም አሳማሚ ቅጣት አላቸው፡፡
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ لَن يَضُرُّواْ ٱللَّهَ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ish'tarawū al-kuf'ra bil-īmāni lan yaḍurrū al-laha shayan walahum ʿadhābun alīmun
